name: Hiyori
description: A versatile Telegram Group Management Bot.

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True to delete command messages from users without the necessary permissions.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables. Leave it as it is.

EVENT_LOGS.description: Channel for event logs to note down important bot-level events. Recommend making this public. Example: '-123456'

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

DEV_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

DRAGONS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

DEMONS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who can use Gban From Your Bot

TIGERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who can not be banned by your Bot

WOLVES.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as whitelisted - can't be banned with your bot.

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your Telegram support group chat username. Users will reach out for assistance. Example: MyGroupChatUsernameBlah. Avoid pointing to Miko Support to prevent conflicts.

TOKEN.description: Bot token obtained from @BotFather on Telegram.
